citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Southwest Fisheries Science Center (SFSC), Pacific Fisheries Environmental Laboratory (PFEL)
citeinfo.title: FNMOC Six-Hourly and Monthly Mean Sea Level Pressure

descript.abstract:
PFEL monthly mean sea level pressure maps based on the FNMOC 360x181 (1-degree) analyzed fields.
Download or plot the data from the PFEL Live Access Server (LAS) (http://www.pfeg.noaa.gov/products/las.html) URL -- ( http://www.pfeg.noaa.gov/products/PFEL/modeled/pressure_maps/pressure_maps.html )
( A TCODE project )
[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
descript.purpose: To provide model derived data products which will assist in describing the variability in the ocean environment.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
